removed_from_previous: message parameter in refinements (use error parameter)
z.record() single-argument form (now requires key and value schemas)
key_features: Top-level format validators: z.email(), z.url(), z.uuid()
ISO validators: z.iso.date(), z.iso.time(), z.iso.datetime(), z.iso.duration()
error function parameter for differentiated error messages
breaking_changes: String validators moved to top-level: z.email() instead of z.string().email()
z.string().ip() removed — use z.ipv4() or z.ipv6()
required_error and invalid_type_error removed from schema options
message parameter deprecated — use error parameter
Schema-level error can be a function for differentiated messages
z.record() now requires 2 arguments (key schema and value schema)
notes: Use z.ipv4() or z.ipv6(), NOT z.string().ip()
Schema-level error as function: z.string({ error: (issue) => { ... } })
Use z.treeifyError(error) instead of error.format() or error.flatten()
